original_title: Dans les Cieux et Sur la Terre
overview: Vertiginous masses of carved limestone give way to an ecstasy of light and living color through an alchemical spell of elemental transformation. Hierarchies dissolve as the transient quotidian inspires the monumental. Dans les Cieux et Sur la Terre was shot and hand-processed entirely on 16mm reversal films, with all of the composite images created in-camera.
title: Dans les Cieux et Sur la Terre
